resume.skillmessage: Basic knowledge in Python and HTML.  Current interests are in Open Source software such as PFSense, TrueNAS, and other sources.

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Informatics with a Concentration in Information Tehnology
education.description: Currently on a path in my education so I can be a project manager that concentrates on heavily sensitive data and highly secure infrastructure.
Persued the most rigorous course load I could handle, while keeping my focus on music which was my passion and degree path at the time.

testimonials.text: Michael is the best employee that I have ever worked with, and I have hired hundreds of staff before, for companies big and small.
